subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: Steve Flesch shot a one-over-par 73 and beat Michael Allen by two shots to win the inaugural Turning Stone Resort Championship in Verona, N.Y. It was Flesch’s second PGA Tour victory in two months.
snippet: Steve Flesch shot a one-over-par 73 and beat Michael Allen by two shots to win the inaugural Turning Stone Resort Championship in Verona, N.Y. It was Flesch’s second PGA Tour victory in two months.
